addr: Hammersmith Road. Kensington. LONDON W14 8UX GB
title: FIDE Open
desc: 90 minutes for 40 moves + 30 minutes for all remaining moves, with a 30 second increment starting at move 1.  Anyone can enter the FIDE Open. The organisers will invite a minimum of 12 Grandmasters.   Untitled players can take up to 3 half point byes between rounds 1-8 provided they are requested before the end of the previous round.
